Field Detail

DEFAULT_NUMBER_OF_WORKERS

public static final int DEFAULT_NUMBER_OF_WORKERS
The number of Worker threads initialized on an Android phone. You can override this behavior by calling PlatformUtils.setNumberOfWorkers() at program startup.

See Also:
